entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Hello WorldFinally, done with the construction. Mainly for technology sharing and discussing, and occasionally talk about other stuff. ðŸ˜‚ Introduction: Ideas: Inspiration sharing Books: Book recommendation Courses: Course collection 1234567// Javaclass HelloWorld { public static void main() { System.out.println("Hello World!"); }} 1234567// C++#include "iostream"int main() { std::cout << "Hello World!" << std::endl; return 0;} 1234567// C#include "stdio.h"int main() { printf("Hello World!\n"); return 0;} 12# Pythonprint("Hello World!") 12// JavaScriptConsole.log("Hello World!");
